document_data.name: Vesper Soulhearth
document_data.mainbody: '''Vesper Soulhearth''' was a [[doomguide]] who lived in the city of [[Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the 1480s DR, Vesper and a contingent of [[Kelemvorite]] [[priest]]s were tasked with defeating the [[undead]] that took control of the village of [[Ebon Downs]].

He later was involved in the defeat of the necromancer [[Morlanth]].<ref>[[Cryptic Studios]] (February 2017). ''[[Neverwinter: The Cloaked Ascendancy]]''. [[Perfect World Entertainment]].
